cast.name: 玛利亚·帕库尔尼斯 Maria Pakulnis

awards:
第17届中国（广州）国际纪录片节(2019)
　　“金红棉”国际纪录片评优单元 优秀艺术表现纪录片
introduction: The key aim of every ZOO is to protect animal species from extinction. In times of war, the most endangered species was the man. Under the Nazis' noses, about 300 people, mainly Jews, m.77mi.cc found shelter at the Warsaw Zoo during the Second World War. With the help of reenacted scenes with animals, interviews with the survivors, and archive footage, we are going to revive the surreal atmosphere of those events.
